job.title: Jr. Software Engineer
job.description:
Jr. Software Engineer                 Location: Hybrid/Remote, with 1-2 Days potentially in McLean, VA        Us Citizenship required          Project and Opportunity Overview        We are currently searching for Software Engineers to be part of our IT consulting team to support a variety of commercial and government clients. The successful candidate should be open to new challenges supporting leading Path clients.          Position Requirements           - Demonstrated prior experience (potentially course work) performing coding/programming/software development tasks in Java.   
   - Experience with Java Applications and or Java Frameworks (Spring, etc...)   
   - Strong technical and communications skills.   
   - Excellent interpersonal and team building skills with the ability to work independently as well as in a team environment. Must be detail oriented with strong organization skills with the ability to manage, prioritize, and multi-task on multiple project work streams.   
   - Ability to solve problems at a tactical and functional level, have excellent oral and written communication skills, a solid work ethic and unquestioned integrity.   
   - Self-motivating, entrepreneurial spirit with the ability to be resourceful and take initiative.   
   - Be able to implement software both as a team and independently   
   - Basic understanding of software engineering concepts and methodologies   
   - Ability to program, implement, test, and document software solutions   
   - Ability to process large data flows   
   - US Citizenship required.   
   - Background check required.   
   -     
      Nice to have, but not required           - Web automation experience   
   - Financial banking knowledge   
   - TSYS data conversion   
   - Extract Transform Load (ETL) data transformation   
    Requirements:      Years of Experience: This position is open to candidates with 0 to 5 years prior work experience                Education Requirements: B.S. in a technical field such as Computer Science or Engineering         Benefits:      Leading Path is an award-winning Information Technology and Management Consulting firm focused on providing solutions in process, technology, and operations to our government and Fortune 500 clients. We offer a professional and supportive family-friendly work environment with a strong work-life balance. Leading Path provides a comprehensive and competitive benefits package, 401K, tuition reimbursement and opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
